org.apache.accumulo.core.replication

Class ReplicationTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.core.replication.ReplicationTarget

  • public class ReplicationTarget
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for where some work needs to be replicated
Shall be called with UnorderedWorkAssigner.
